title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

version.title: Config version
version.description: This field is used by ScreamAPI to identify how to parse the config file. This allows ScreamAPI to parse older config files in a backward compatible manner. Therefore, **this field must not be edited manually**!

logging.title: Logging
logging.description: Enables or disables logging into a _ScreamAPI.log_ file.

block_metrics.title: Block Metrics
block_metrics.description: Blocks reporting of analytics and usage metrics by the game to Epic Online Services. Metrics sent by EOS SDK itself remain unaffected.

catalog_items.title: Catalog Items
catalog_items.description: Options in this object specify behaviour when games use `EOS_Ecom_QueryOwnership` function.

unlock_all.title: Unlock all catalog items
unlock_all.description: Controls if all items should be automatically unlocked.

override.title: Override ownership
override.description: Specifies items idsÂ¹ that override the behaviour of `unlock_all`. If `unlock_all` is _true_, then items ids in this array will be locked. If `unlock_all` is _false_, then items ids in this array will be unlocked.

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: Options in this object specify behaviour when games use `EOS_Ecom_QueryEntitlements` function.

unlock_all.title: The unlock_all schema
unlock_all.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

auto_inject.title: The auto_inject schema
auto_inject.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
